sect1.title: Scale/Colour Concepts by Numerical Value
sect1.para: The Scale/Colour Concepts by Numerical Value Annotator allows users to view the importance of a concept based on a specified attribute's numerical values. Users can select the minimum and maximum sizes for concepts to scale. They can also specify colours for the concepts' colouring or use the rainbow scale (red = high, purple = low) by ticking the corresponding checkbox. They can pick a colour for concepts which do not carry any information about the selected attribute.
